text: Mwebwe bantu, Shetani ntibate mukaga nkuko yakuye abavyeyi banyu mw’ijuru nukubambura impuzu zabo kugira ngo yerekane ibitsina vyabo, mu vy’ukuri wewe hamwe n’ubwoko bwiwe barababona, mugihe namwe mutababona, ntankeka twebwe twarabahaye ayo mashetani kuba abagenzi babamwe batemera Imana yabo y’ukuri
